snippet: Michael Pietsch is known as a skilled editor who can handle literary titans like David Foster Wallace as deftly as blockbuster commercial authors like James Patterson. He replaces David Young.
abstract: Michael Pietsch is known as a skilled editor who can handle literary titans like David Foster Wallace as deftly as blockbuster commercial authors like James Patterson. He replaces David Young.

headline.main: Michael Pietsch of Little, Brown to Be Hachette Book's Chief Executive
headline.print_headline: At Hachette Book Group, Publisher Is Named Chief
